mapper.select:
SELECT REC_ID as "recId", TRANSFER_NO as "transferNo", ITEM_CODE as "itemCode", ITEM_NAME as "itemName", LINE_NO as "lineNo", LINE_NAME as "lineName", LINE_SUB_NO as "lineSubNo", LINE_SUB_NAME as "lineSubName", MAJOR_CODE as "majorCode", MAJOR_NAME as "majorName", PRO_CODE as "proCode", PRO_NAME as "proName", ORDER_NO as "orderNo", ORDER_NAME as "orderName", SUPPLIER_ID as "supplierId", SUPPLIER_NAME as "supplierName", MAT_SPECIFI as "matSpecifi", BRAND as "brand", OTHER_FEATURE as "otherFeature", APPENDIX_NO as "appendixNo", STOCK_UNIT as "stockUnit", QUANTITY as "quantity", IS_BOM as "isBom", IS_INVISIBLE as "isInvisible", TAX_PRICE as "taxPrice", PRE_TAX_PRICE as "preTaxPrice", TAX_RATE as "taxRate", IS_DOC as "isDoc", ASSURANCE_PERIOD as "assurancePeriod", REMARK as "remark", LIFE_YEARS as "lifeYears", USE_COUNTER as "useCounter", MANUFACTURE as "manufacture", VENDOR_CODE as "vendorCode", POSITION1_CODE as "position1Code", POSITION1_NAME as "position1Name", POSITION2_CODE as "position2Code", POSITION2_NAME as "position2Name", POSITION3 as "position3", POSITION_REMARK as "positionRemark", ORDER_AMT as "orderAmt", CONSTRUCTURE_FORM as "constructureForm", NET_HEIGHT as "netHeight", IS_OWNER_SUPPLY as "isOwnerSupply", OWNER_SUPPLY_QUANTITY as "ownerSupplyQuantity", OWNER_SUPPLY_UNIT as "ownerSupplyUnit", OWNER_SUPPLY_PRICE as "ownerSupplyPrice", OWNER_SUPPLY_TAX_PRICE as "ownerSupplyTaxPrice", OWNER_SUPPLY_ORDER as "ownerSupplyOrder", INSTALL_AMT as "installAmt", AUDIT_MSG as "auditMsg", STATUS as "status", REC_ID2 as "recId2", REC_CREATOR as "recCreator", REC_CREATE_TIME as "recCreateTime", REC_REVISOR as "recRevisor", REC_REVISE_TIME as "recReviseTime", REC_DELETOR as "recDeletor", REC_DELETE_TIME as "recDeleteTime", DELETE_FLAG as "deleteFlag", ARCHIVE_FLAG as "archiveFlag", EXT1 as "ext1", EXT2 as "ext2", EXT3 as "ext3", EXT4 as "ext4", EXT5 as "ext5", EXT6 as "ext6", IS_EQUIPMENT as "isEquipment", EAM_PROCESS_STATUS as "eamProcessStatus" FROM T_TRANSFER_DETAIL td WHERE 1=1
AND TRANSFER_NO like '%' || #{transferNo} || '%'
AND ITEM_CODE like '%' || #{itemCode} || '%'
AND ITEM_NAME like '%' || #{itemName} || '%'
AND POSITION1_CODE=#{position1Code}
AND EAM_PROCESS_STATUS=#{eamProcessStatus}
AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM T_EQUIPMENT e1 WHERE e1.SOURCE_REC_ID=td.REC_ID AND e1.APPROVAL_STATUS = '10')
AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM T_EQUIPMENT e2 WHERE e2.SOURCE_REC_ID=td.REC_ID AND e2.APPROVAL_STATUS = '10')
AND MAJOR_CODE like '%' || #{majorCode} || '%'
AND ORDER_NO like '%' || #{orderNo} || '%'
AND ORDER_NAME like '%' || #{orderName} || '%'
ORDER BY SUBSTR(TRANSFER_NO,3) DESC,ITEM_CODE DESC

SELECT REC_ID as "recId", TRANSFER_NO as "transferNo", ITEM_CODE as "itemCode", ITEM_NAME as "itemName", LINE_NO as "lineNo", LINE_NAME as "lineName", LINE_SUB_NO as "lineSubNo", LINE_SUB_NAME as "lineSubName", MAJOR_CODE as "majorCode", MAJOR_NAME as "majorName", PRO_CODE as "proCode", PRO_NAME as "proName", ORDER_NO as "orderNo", ORDER_NAME as "orderName", SUPPLIER_ID as "supplierId", SUPPLIER_NAME as "supplierName", MAT_SPECIFI as "matSpecifi", BRAND as "brand", OTHER_FEATURE as "otherFeature", APPENDIX_NO as "appendixNo", STOCK_UNIT as "stockUnit", QUANTITY as "quantity", IS_BOM as "isBom", IS_INVISIBLE as "isInvisible", TAX_PRICE as "taxPrice", PRE_TAX_PRICE as "preTaxPrice", TAX_RATE as "taxRate", IS_DOC as "isDoc", ASSURANCE_PERIOD as "assurancePeriod", REMARK as "remark", LIFE_YEARS as "lifeYears", USE_COUNTER as "useCounter", MANUFACTURE as "manufacture", VENDOR_CODE as "vendorCode", POSITION1_CODE as "position1Code", POSITION1_NAME as "position1Name", POSITION2_CODE as "position2Code", POSITION2_NAME as "position2Name", POSITION3 as "position3", POSITION_REMARK as "positionRemark", ORDER_AMT as "orderAmt", CONSTRUCTURE_FORM as "constructureForm", NET_HEIGHT as "netHeight", IS_OWNER_SUPPLY as "isOwnerSupply", OWNER_SUPPLY_QUANTITY as "ownerSupplyQuantity", OWNER_SUPPLY_UNIT as "ownerSupplyUnit", OWNER_SUPPLY_PRICE as "ownerSupplyPrice", OWNER_SUPPLY_TAX_PRICE as "ownerSupplyTaxPrice", OWNER_SUPPLY_ORDER as "ownerSupplyOrder", INSTALL_AMT as "installAmt", AUDIT_MSG as "auditMsg", STATUS as "status", REC_ID2 as "recId2", REC_CREATOR as "recCreator", REC_CREATE_TIME as "recCreateTime", REC_REVISOR as "recRevisor", REC_REVISE_TIME as "recReviseTime", REC_DELETOR as "recDeletor", REC_DELETE_TIME as "recDeleteTime", DELETE_FLAG as "deleteFlag", ARCHIVE_FLAG as "archiveFlag", EXT1 as "ext1", EXT2 as "ext2", EXT3 as "ext3", EXT4 as "ext4", EXT5 as "ext5", EXT6 as "ext6", IS_EQUIPMENT as "isEquipment", EAM_PROCESS_STATUS as "eamProcessStatus" FROM T_TRANSFER_DETAIL WHERE REC_ID=#{id}

SELECT REC_ID as "recId", TRANSFER_NO as "transferNo", ITEM_CODE as "itemCode", ITEM_NAME as "itemName", LINE_NO as "lineNo", LINE_NAME as "lineName", LINE_SUB_NO as "lineSubNo", LINE_SUB_NAME as "lineSubName", MAJOR_CODE as "majorCode", MAJOR_NAME as "majorName", PRO_CODE as "proCode", PRO_NAME as "proName", ORDER_NO as "orderNo", ORDER_NAME as "orderName", SUPPLIER_ID as "supplierId", SUPPLIER_NAME as "supplierName", MAT_SPECIFI as "matSpecifi", BRAND as "brand", OTHER_FEATURE as "otherFeature", APPENDIX_NO as "appendixNo", STOCK_UNIT as "stockUnit", QUANTITY as "quantity", IS_BOM as "isBom", IS_INVISIBLE as "isInvisible", TAX_PRICE as "taxPrice", PRE_TAX_PRICE as "preTaxPrice", TAX_RATE as "taxRate", IS_DOC as "isDoc", ASSURANCE_PERIOD as "assurancePeriod", REMARK as "remark", LIFE_YEARS as "lifeYears", USE_COUNTER as "useCounter", MANUFACTURE as "manufacture", VENDOR_CODE as "vendorCode", POSITION1_CODE as "position1Code", POSITION1_NAME as "position1Name", POSITION2_CODE as "position2Code", POSITION2_NAME as "position2Name", POSITION3 as "position3", POSITION_REMARK as "positionRemark", ORDER_AMT as "orderAmt", CONSTRUCTURE_FORM as "constructureForm", NET_HEIGHT as "netHeight", IS_OWNER_SUPPLY as "isOwnerSupply", OWNER_SUPPLY_QUANTITY as "ownerSupplyQuantity", OWNER_SUPPLY_UNIT as "ownerSupplyUnit", OWNER_SUPPLY_PRICE as "ownerSupplyPrice", OWNER_SUPPLY_TAX_PRICE as "ownerSupplyTaxPrice", OWNER_SUPPLY_ORDER as "ownerSupplyOrder", INSTALL_AMT as "installAmt", AUDIT_MSG as "auditMsg", STATUS as "status", REC_ID2 as "recId2", REC_CREATOR as "recCreator", REC_CREATE_TIME as "recCreateTime", REC_REVISOR as "recRevisor", REC_REVISE_TIME as "recReviseTime", REC_DELETOR as "recDeletor", REC_DELETE_TIME as "recDeleteTime", DELETE_FLAG as "deleteFlag", ARCHIVE_FLAG as "archiveFlag", EXT1 as "ext1", EXT2 as "ext2", EXT3 as "ext3", EXT4 as "ext4", EXT5 as "ext5", EXT6 as "ext6", IS_EQUIPMENT as "isEquipment", EAM_PROCESS_STATUS as "eamProcessStatus" FROM T_TRANSFER_DETAIL td WHERE 1=1
AND TRANSFER_NO like '%' || #{transferNo} || '%'
AND ITEM_CODE like '%' || #{itemCode} || '%'
AND ITEM_NAME like '%' || #{itemName} || '%'
AND POSITION1_CODE=#{position1Code}
AND EAM_PROCESS_STATUS=#{eamProcessStatus}
AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM T_EQUIPMENT e1 WHERE e1.SOURCE_REC_ID=td.REC_ID AND e1.APPROVAL_STATUS = '10')
AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM T_EQUIPMENT e2 WHERE e2.SOURCE_REC_ID=td.REC_ID AND e2.APPROVAL_STATUS = '10')
AND MAJOR_CODE like '%' || #{majorCode} || '%'
AND ORDER_NO like '%' || #{orderNo} || '%'
AND ORDER_NAME like '%' || #{orderName} || '%'
and REC_ID in (
#{id}
)
ORDER BY SUBSTR(TRANSFER_NO,3) DESC,ITEM_CODE DESC
mapper.update:
UPDATE T_TRANSFER_DETAIL SET
TRANSFER_NO = #{transferNo},
ITEM_CODE = #{itemCode},
ITEM_NAME = #{itemName},
LINE_NO = #{lineNo},
LINE_NAME = #{lineName},
LINE_SUB_NO = #{lineSubNo},
LINE_SUB_NAME = #{lineSubName},
MAJOR_CODE = #{majorCode},
MAJOR_NAME = #{majorName},
PRO_CODE = #{proCode},
PRO_NAME = #{proName},
ORDER_NO = #{orderNo},
ORDER_NAME = #{orderName},
SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId},
SUPPLIER_NAME = #{supplierName},
MAT_SPECIFI = #{matSpecifi},
BRAND = #{brand},
OTHER_FEATURE = #{otherFeature},
APPENDIX_NO = #{appendixNo},
STOCK_UNIT = #{stockUnit},
QUANTITY = #{quantity,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
IS_BOM = #{isBom},
IS_INVISIBLE = #{isInvisible},
TAX_PRICE = #{taxPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
PRE_TAX_PRICE = #{preTaxPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
TAX_RATE = #{taxRate,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
IS_DOC = #{isDoc},
ASSURANCE_PERIOD = #{assurancePeriod,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
REMARK = #{remark},
LIFE_YEARS = #{lifeYears,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
USE_COUNTER = #{useCounter,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
MANUFACTURE = #{manufacture},
VENDOR_CODE = #{vendorCode},
POSITION1_CODE = #{position1Code},
POSITION1_NAME = #{position1Name},
POSITION2_CODE = #{position2Code},
POSITION2_NAME = #{position2Name},
POSITION3 = #{position3},
POSITION_REMARK = #{positionRemark},
ORDER_AMT = #{orderAmt,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
CONSTRUCTURE_FORM = #{constructureForm},
NET_HEIGHT = #{netHeight},
IS_OWNER_SUPPLY = #{isOwnerSupply},
OWNER_SUPPLY_QUANTITY = #{ownerSupplyQuantity,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
OWNER_SUPPLY_UNIT = #{ownerSupplyUnit},
OWNER_SUPPLY_PRICE = #{ownerSupplyPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
OWNER_SUPPLY_TAX_PRICE = #{ownerSupplyTaxPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
OWNER_SUPPLY_ORDER = #{ownerSupplyOrder},
INSTALL_AMT = #{installAmt,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
AUDIT_MSG = #{auditMsg},
STATUS = #{status},
REC_ID2 = #{recId2},
ARCHIVE_FLAG = #{archiveFlag},
EXT1 = #{ext1},
EXT2 = #{ext2},
EXT3 = #{ext3},
EXT4 = #{ext4},
EXT5 = #{ext5},
EXT6 = #{ext6},
IS_EQUIPMENT = #{isEquipment},
EAM_PROCESS_STATUS = #{eamProcessStatus},
REC_REVISOR = #{recRevisor}, REC_REVISE_TIME = #{recReviseTime} WHERE REC_ID = #{recId}
mapper.select: SELECT REC_ID as "recId", ENAME as "ename", CNAME as "cname", QUANTITY as "quantity", MEASURE_UNIT as "measureUnit", PARENT_ID as "parentId", IS_LEAF as "isLeaf", TREE_ID as "treeId" FROM T_BOM START WITH ENAME = #{ename} CONNECT BY PRIOR REC_ID = PARENT_ID
